access_wallet.title: Access MEW Portfolio
access_wallet.description: Check balances, swap and buy crypto, and tokens, grow and track your portfolio.

all_wallets.title: All Wallets
all_wallets.description: Ledger, private key, keystore, mobile wallets, we have it all

access_wallet_recovery_phrase.title: Access Wallet with Recovery Phrase
access_wallet_recovery_phrase.do_you_have_an_extra_word: Do you have an extra word?

step1.title: Enter your recovery phrase
step1.description: Also called mnemonic phrase, you can use 12, 15, 18, 21 or 24 words phrase to access your wallet. Just enter as many words as you have in your phrase.

wc_dialog.title: Connect to MEW portfolio
wc_dialog.scan_qr_code: Scan QR code with { walletName } to connect.

derivation_path.title: Derivation Path
derivation_path.description: Select the derivation path for your wallet. If you are unsure, leave it as default.

error_connecting: Failed to connect. Check your wallet for errors
